price: Allah je nevjernike prokleo i za njih oganj razbuktali pripremio,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha laʿana al-kāfirīna wa-aʿadda lahum saʿīran
